definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

pinyin: Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1

sentences.english: Gordimer's fiction has been the subject of much commentary in South Africa over the years.
sentences.chinese: 戈迪默的小说已多年来在南非引起了很大评论的话题。

sentences.english: South African plant widely cultivated for its showy pure white spathe and yellow spadix.
sentences.chinese: 长有耀眼的纯白色苞和黄色纤维的一种南非种植植物。

sentences.english: And rural villagers in southern Africa harvest caterpillars from the local mopane trees.
sentences.chinese: 南非的一些农业村庄也从可乐豆木上收获毛虫。

sentences.english: The Freedom Cup is a competition between New Zealand and South Africa during the Tri-Nations.
sentences.chinese: 自由杯是在三国赛期间新西兰和南非竞争的一个杯赛。

sentences.english: South Africa Has Beautiful Scenery, Mild Climate , "Rainbow Country"Good Name.
sentences.chinese: 南非风景娟秀，天气温顺，有“彩虹之国”的美称。

sentences.english: And of course there were a number of location-based searches surrounding the World Cup, which took place in South Africa over the summer.
sentences.chinese: 当然，还有大量的关于夏季南非世界杯的本地搜索。

sentences.english: They don't want people to see shacks on the road in South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 他们不想让外人们看到南非公路边的窝棚。

sentences.english: It exports water and people, both to South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 莱索托出口水资源和人口，出口地都是南非。

sentences.english: One man is walking along the beach in Camptown, South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，一个人在南非开普敦海滩漫步。

sentences.english: South Africa is the centre of the canned hunting industry.
sentences.chinese: 南非是篱内狩猎产业的中心。

sentences.english: South Africa is not everything we would have hoped for, that's for sure.
sentences.chinese: 南非并非一切都合我们的心意，这是确定无疑的。

sentences.english: This is turning into a huge disaster for FIFA and the South African organisers.
sentences.chinese: 这将给国际足联和南非的组织者带来一场巨大的灾难。

sentences.english: In South Africa, Global English therefore represents the cultural equivalent of a neutron bomb.
sentences.chinese: 在南非，全球化英语就相当于一颗文化的中子弹。

sentences.english: Skinny-dipping at gunpoint did not do the South Africans much good.
sentences.chinese: 南非运动员被枪指着裸体下水也没有多大益处。

sentences.english: The Dewanis, married for two weeks, were honeymooning in South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 德瓦尼夫妇，结婚了两个星期，当时在南非度蜜月。

sentences.english: South Africa's constitution is remarkably pro-gay.
sentences.chinese: 南非宪法是非常赞成同性恋的。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
